        exportType: 'default',
        ref: true,
        svgo: false,
        titleProp: true,
      },
      // \u4E0D\u7528\u6BCF\u6B21\u5199 ?react
      include: '**/*.svg',
    }),
  ],
});

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import { create } from "zustand";

type GlobalStore = {
  bears: number;

  increasePopulation: (payload: boolean) => void;
  removeAllBears: (payload: any) => void;
  updateBears: (payload: number) => void;
};

export const useStore = create<GlobalStore>((set) => ({
  bears: 0,
  increasePopulation: () => set((state) => ({ bears: state.bears + 1 })),
  removeAllBears: () => set({ bears: 0 }),
  updateBears: (newBears) => set({ bears: newBears }),
}));
